tags: None
review:
Dr. Parineeta Sharma is a qualified doctor who really knows her hand around kids...I visited her for my 4 year old daughter's tooth ache... she had caries and was very efficiency managed by Dr. Parineeta...
She was very friendly with my daughter and it was amazing how easily she made my daughter cooperate for the treatment, she is really an expert at that...
My daughter is fine now and says that she would always want to come here whenever she has a tooth problem and will only show it to Dr. Parineeta...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My 4 year old son was very afraid with dentist. Dr. Parineeta is so friendly that she is best friend of him now. He is always ready to visit Dr. Parineeta. Thank you doc. I was also afraid  how a 4 year old child can be ready for dental treatment but your friendly nature. I highly recommend the doc. You must go for any dental treatment. She is very punctual, do your treatment very fast with perfection. My son gave her 1000 points instead of 100.
Thank you doc.

tags: None
review:
Everything was really smooth , quick and the main thing it was painless. Person like me who is afraid to visit  to a  dentist should  definitely go to Dr. Parineeta . No pain and your treatment is done.
I will definitely recommend Dr. Parineeta to my family and friends.

tags: None
review: It was my daughter’s first dental visit and Dr Parineeta sharma was very nice and so patient with my daughter.She made sure that I understood all her dental needs before i left the clinic.Very informative doctor …would highly recommend her .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My daughter was horrified with the dental treatment.. But after meeting Dr Parineeta sharma n started doing treatment by her ;I was relieved n relaxed..... She treated my daughter like an angel....... She is really a very good doctor....... I am feeling short of words for her...... Her kindness, friendly nature a above all her knowledge abt the kids dental problems is vast and amazing..... Stay blessed my dear lovely doctor for treating my daughter

review:

Dr. Parineeta treated my niece and the way she did the treatment was perfect. Very friendly doctor. My niece is not scared of dentists anymore. Highly recommended for kids dental care

tags: None
review: I can surely say one thing about Dr.Parineeta Sharma that she has got magical hands,my daughter was having pain and had cavities she releaved the pain instantly and did the fillings of my kid . I definitely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
***** **** *** * ***** *******
Dr. Parineeta did my root canal treatment and she did it so well. My whole treatment was painless and she took less time. My friends scared me a lot regarding root canal treatment but Dr. Parineeta did it so perfectly that now I don’t have any fear regarding the dental treatment. I will definitely recommend her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am scared of dentists but she made me very comfortable by ensuring that the process won't be painful. She does the work patiently. I was very satisfied.
